channel.title: Frame help
channel.description:
im using a project czar source and you know how czar sources have the 2 lines at the top of the screen saying welcome to "server name here" and underneath that ti says players online: # or w/e the owner set it to, well has anyone else noticed that thoose 2 lines will never appear at the same time as the safezone message frame in the bottom right hand corner of the screen?
Is there any posile way to fix this? because its annoying the 2 frames swapping over every like 10 secs.

item.title: Frame help
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

That is client based, you cannot have two frames at once, I tried that before, but people told me only one works. Have you noticed that when the wildy sign comes up, the other frame disappeared.

Read full topic

item.title: Frame help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

i can remove it easily, the thing is i wan BOTH on my scren, not just 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Frame help
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:1, topic:183221”]im using a project czar source and you know how czar sources have the 2 lines at the top of the screen saying welcome to “server name here” and underneath that ti says players online: # or w/e the owner set it to, well has anyone else noticed that thoose 2 lines will never appear at the same time as the safezone message frame in the bottom right hand corner of the screen?

Is there any posile way to fix this? because its annoying the 2 frames swapping over every like 10 secs.[/quote]

Yes, I had this, but I removed it, if you send me your client.java, I’ll happily remove it for you.

All the best,

Musicmad

Read full topic
